package.name: naoqi_bridge_msgs
package.description: The naoqi_bridge_msgs package provides custom messages for running Aldebaran's robot such as NAO and Pepper. See the packages nao_robot and pepper_robot for details.
package.author: Karsten Knese
package.buildtool_depend:
rosidl_default_generators
actionlib_msgs genmsg geometry_msgs nav_msgs sensor_msgs builtin_interfaces trajectory_msgs
actionlib_msgs
geometry_msgs rosidl_default_runtime nav_msgs sensor_msgs builtin_interfaces trajectory_msgs
rosidl_interface_packages
naoqi_msgs naoqi_msgs
ament_cmake
